feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.22
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove unused types by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15108
  • adding buffer settings for single image by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15111

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.21...3.2.22

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.23
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • prevent empty snippets being saved, don't crash for old empty snippets by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15114

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.22...3.2.23

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.24
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • rely on llm status rather than initialised variable by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15117

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.23...3.2.24

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • sort table names alphabetically when selecting data source by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15110
  • App service API typing - D -> R by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15112
  • Add automation survey popup by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15119
  • Fix schema exporting. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15123
  • Final app service API typing by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15120
  • Update to TypeScript 5.7.2. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15126

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.24...3.2.25
